amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete language which placed limits on funding for the creation of a Sodium-Iodide Manufacturing Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike language regarding the Sodium Iodide Manufacturing Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 248 (Roll no. 221).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Nadler.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 248 (Roll no. 221).
